Talk000: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>Welcome to the Great Deku Tree's Navel!
Talk010: <sp:3:0:2:0001>Come back and catch some Zs soon, OK?
Talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>You can sleep serenely here, drinking in
the sweet forest air!
Talk011:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>Oh, I don't want your rupees! You're the
great Mr. Hero!
Talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Take as long as you like with your yawns
and your Zs!
Talk012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Your rupees are no good here, so feel
free to stop by and snooze whenever
you'd like!
Talk003: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>How long would you like to snooze?
Talk004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Angry>Until I say "good morning"? Sounds good.
Sleep well!
Talk005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Good morning! You can grab some
breakfast next door at the Spore Store!
Talk006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Angry>Until I say "good afternoon"? Sounds
good. Sleep well!
Talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Good afternoon! I stood watch while you
were asleep, Mr. Hero!
Talk008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Angry>Until I say "good evening"? Sounds good.
Sleep well!
Talk009:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Good evening! I'm a bit sleepy, but I made
sure I was able to wake you up!
